text: Thomas Daniel Wagstaffe was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward for Sunderland. ==References== Category:People from Patna district Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Fleetwood Town F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Morecambe F.C. players Category:Crewe Alexandra F.C. players Category:Mossley A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Tom Wagstaffe
